job_tasks.phrase: Innovate with Large Language Models to develop and refine Charlotte AI's capabilities.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly mentions innovating with Large Language Models to develop and refine capabilities, which falls under the core of modeling.

job_tasks.phrase: Construct and maintain data pipelines, engage in data upkeep, and contribute to the training and implementation of custom LLMs.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase includes 'training and implementation of custom LLMs', which is a key aspect of modeling, alongside data pipeline work.

job_tasks.phrase: building the LLM Ops platform which provides data scientists, software engineers, product managers and other team members with a collaborative environment that facilitates iterative data exploration and annotation for training purposes, as well as experimentation, models evaluation and monitoring of Large Language Models.
job_tasks.justification: The entire phrase describes the creation and maintenance of an 'LLM Ops platform' focused on facilitating processes like data exploration, annotation, evaluation, and monitoring of LLMs, which are core MLOps responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: You are going to develop and maintain the LLM Ops platform which facilitates continuous improvements of CrowdStrike's Charlotte AI assistant product.
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development and maintenance of an 'LLM Ops platform' for continuous improvements, a direct indication of MLOps work.

job_tasks.phrase: Improve backend microservices, pinpointing and addressing critical concerns to implement effective solutions.
job_tasks.justification: This describes enhancing backend services and implementing solutions, which are standard software development tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Employ established CrowdStrike tools and services to build cloud solutions for detecting and countering targeted cyber assaults.
job_tasks.justification: The phrase indicates building 'cloud solutions' using company tools, which is a software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Emphasize top-tier coding quality by adhering to best practices, rigorous testing, and thorough logging and metrics.
job_tasks.justification: This focuses on software engineering best practices like coding quality, testing, logging, and metrics.

job_tasks.phrase: Own your work with autonomy, end to end: develop, test, deploy and monitor your changes.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the end-to-end ownership of changes, including development, testing, deployment, and monitoring, which are key MLOps lifecycle activities.

job_tasks.phrase: Stay attuned to our customers' challenges, always seeking ways to enhance support.
job_tasks.justification: This shows an understanding of customer needs and a focus on enhancing support, aligning with business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Prior experience with Golang and LLMs is not required, but will be helpful.
We will mentor and train in security topics as needed.
a strong aptitude for continuous learning is vital
Collaborate with teams of Data Scientists, Data Engineering, Product and Cloud Engineering in order to build and evolve the LLM Ops platform for LLM improvements.
Collaborate across various teams to brainstorm, define, and devise solutions.
Work within a collaborative and agile team environment.
Contribute to mentoring fellow engineers across a spectrum of technologies and also absorb knowledge from them.
Own your work with autonomy, end to end: develop, test, deploy and monitor your changes.
pinpointing and addressing critical concerns to implement effective solutions.
Constantly explore ways to refine product architecture, knowledge models, user experience, performance, and reliability.

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes building and maintaining an 'LLM Ops platform' and directly mentions responsibilities like training and implementing custom LLMs. While it includes software development tasks, the core focus on LLM operations, innovation with LLMs, and the specific technologies indicate a specialization in generative AI systems.
